plot: Documentary filmmaker Fredrik von Krusenstjerna meets Berth Milton, Jr, wealthy businessman in the porn industry, and finds a man emotionally damaged after a struggle for power with his own father.
title: Porrkungens tårar
plot_es: Documentary filmmaker Fredrik von Krusenstjerna meets Berth Milton, Jr, wealthy businessman in the porn industry, and finds a man emotionally damaged after a struggle for power with his own father.
